name: Get Going!
description:
You have limited cash at your disposal and unlimited time. Travel the world before your cash runs out. 

PS: Watch out for the cost when traveling. Nearby places are cheaper. 

- Red indicates current player city

- Purple indicates already visited cities

Assets Used: 

https://www.name-generator.org.uk/?i=10dxoamb for generating city names.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/camera/drag-camera-2d-126070#descrip... for camera interactions. 

BoscaCeoil for background music.

Gimp for Artwork.
